rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer that incorporates floor-to-ceiling windows on the east side for morning sunlight and adherence to Vastu principles.
An open-plan living room with modern furniture and large floor-to-ceiling windows on the north wall for natural light. The layout ensures a clear view of the entrance.
A functional modern kitchen designed with energy-efficient appliances and a glass backsplash that complements the contemporary aesthetic. Located adjacent to the living area for ease of access.
Compact yet modern bathroom with water-saving fixtures and ambient lighting.

openings.description: Large, modern door with reinforced glass panels.

Floor-to-ceiling window providing ample daylight and a modern aesthetic.

rooms.description: The master bedroom is designed with a dual-function space for relaxation and as a dedicated home office area during the day. It features built-in storage solutions and incorporates Vastu principles by orienting the bed towards the north.
A compact modern bathroom adjoining the master bedroom with water-efficient fixtures.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling window ensuring natural light and a view of the surroundings.
